attorneys.attorney_name: Asst United States Attorney Br-Mag Duty

charges.charge_description: An alien who had been previously denied admission, excluded, deported or removed, knowingly and unlawfully was present in the United States, the said defendant having not obtained the consent of the Attorney General or the Secretary of the Department of Homeland Security to reapply for admission into the United States; 8 USC 1326(a)(1)(b)(1)

charges.charge_offence_description: An alien who had been previously denied admission,
